newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures close mostly higher.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures close mostly higher.

text.p: Dec 18 - U.S. stock index futures closed mostly higher in what several traders described as the slowest day in two weeks. Traders are looking for March S&Ps to rise above resistance at 741.50. Upside targets are pegged at 742.00 to 743.00. They are anticipating an uneventful expiration. Nikkeis were lower.
